Trample; Delve [i](Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)[/i]
Barimont enters enters with an additional +1/+1 counter for each creature card you exiled from your graveyard to cast it.
{B}, Remove two counters from Barimont: Target creature you don't control gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
